question: Under which article consists the provision "No citizen or foreigner holding any office of profit or trust under the State is to accept any present, emolument or office from or under any foreign State without the consent of the president"?
explanation: Article 18 abolishes titles and makes a provision that, "No citizen or foreigner holding any office of profit or trust under the State is to accept any present, emolument or office from or under any foreign State without the consent of the president".
